long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your learning journey with Hyper Mark, the ultimate AI-powered bookmark manager designed to simplify knowledge management for curious minds.

Key Features:

Effortless Organization
- Automatic Summarization: Hyper Mark crawls and summarizes your saved websites, extracting key topics and keywords.
- No Manual Sorting: Eliminates the need for folders or manual tagging; everything is organized for you.

Powerful Semantic Search
 - Natural Language Queries: Find exactly what you’re looking for using everyday language.
- Comprehensive Results: Searches across summaries, topics, and your personal notes.

Chat with Your Bookmarks
- Interactive Interface: Ask questions about your saved sites and get instant answers.
- Effortless Recall: Retrieve bookmarks by asking natural questions like, “What’s the site that helps you optimize images?”

Explore and Discover
- Topic Exploration: Browse bookmarks by topics and subtopics within an intuitive, visual interface.
- Rediscover Hidden Gems: Uncover forgotten bookmarks and valuable information you’ve saved.

Personalization
- Custom Tags and Notes: Add your own tags and attach notes to each bookmark.
- Enhanced Searchability: Your notes are included in search results, aiding memory and context.

Smart Views and Filters
- Built-In Views: Access recent bookmarks, most visited, and overlooked bookmarks with ease.
- Stay Organized: Quickly manage and revisit your resources through smart filtering options.

Lightning-Fast Performance
- Instant Access: Enjoy rapid load times and swift search results to keep your learning uninterrupted.
- Delightful UI: Experience a sleek, intuitive interface designed for maximum productivity.

Seamless Import and Data Ownership
- Easy Import: Bring all your existing Chrome bookmarks into Hyper Mark with one click.
- Full Control: Export all your bookmarks, including topics, notes, summaries, and tags, anytime. Your data is yours.

Why Hyper Mark?

Created by lifelong learner and developer Shahar Nechmad, Hyper Mark was born out of a personal need for a better way to manage an ever-growing base of knowledge. It’s more than a tool—it’s a companion for those who love to learn and explore.
